description:
Conan, Genta, and Mitsuhiko enter the Teimuzu River Kite Flying Event. Renno and Yatsukoshi form the opposing team. Yatsukoshi holds the kite string while Renno holds their kite and speaks on the phone with his wife Takami. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le tournoi de cerfs-volants de la Tamizu (1re partie)
堤無津川凧揚げ事件 (前編)
